images.name: Cafe
images.prompt: Draw a person sitting at a caf√© table with a laptop, books, and a coffee cup, in front of a modern city street with buildings, trees, and passing people.

styles.name: Frottage Technique
styles.prompt: Draw in frottage technique style, with textured paper-rubbing effects, organic surface patterns, charcoal-like textures, layered rubbing marks.

styles.name: Decalcomania
styles.prompt: Draw using decalcomania, with mirrored paint-transfer blotches, unpredictable organic textures, and accidental symmetry.

styles.name: Scumbling
styles.prompt: Draw with translucent scumbled layers, soft cloudy transitions, visible underpainting, and an ethereal haze.

styles.name: Grattage
styles.prompt: Draw with grattage scraping, revealing bright underlying colors, rough surface scratches, and layered paint excavation.

styles.name: Sgraffito
styles.prompt: Draw in sgraffito style, scratching linear motifs through the surface to expose contrasting layers beneath.

styles.name: Soufflage (Blown Paint)
styles.prompt: Draw with blown-paint soufflage effects, wind-driven drips and splatters, airy dispersion, and organic branching forms.

styles.name: Paper-Cut Shadow Layering
styles.prompt: Draw as layered paper-cut shadow art, crisp stacked silhouettes, precise cast shadows, and architectural depth.

styles.name: Stippling Mixed Media
styles.prompt: Draw with dense stippling and mixed textures, micro-dots forming gradients, interleaved with paper, ink, or pastel accents.

styles.name: Digital Encaustic
styles.prompt: Draw in a digital encaustic look, waxy flows, semi-translucent color pools, and molten, tactile surfaces.

styles.name: Textured Gesso Relief
styles.prompt: Draw over textured gesso, sculptural low-relief ridges, impasto-like grooves, and tactile, light-catching surfaces.

styles.name: Mecanorma / Vintage French Collage
styles.prompt: Draw as a Mecanorma collage, cut-and-paste printed textures and patterns with slight misregistration on grainy paper.

styles.name: Stained-Glass (Medieval / Folk)
styles.prompt: Draw as crude stained glass, thick black lead cames, segmented uneven color panes, and backlit luminosity.

styles.name: Xerox / Photocopy Aesthetic
styles.prompt: Draw in Xerox copy-art style, high-contrast black-and-white, degraded midtones, gritty halftone noise, zine energy.

styles.name: Adinkra-Inspired Symbolism (Pseudo-Sankofa)
styles.prompt: Draw with West African Adinkra-style symbols, bold symmetry, dense patterned negatives, and red-black-gold palette.

styles.name: Frutiger Aero
styles.prompt: Draw in a mid-2000s Frutiger Aero vibe, glossy skeuomorphism, glowing bubbles, clean skies and grass, nature-tech harmony.

styles.name: Psychedelic Op Art
styles.prompt: Draw as psychedelic Op Art, precise geometric interference, moire vibrations, high-contrast illusions of motion and warp.

styles.name: Soviet Brutalist Poster
styles.prompt: Draw a Soviet-brutalist poster, monumental geometry, limited red-black-cream palette, bold block typography, concrete grain.

styles.name: Trouvelot Astronomical Pastels
styles.prompt: Draw like a 19th-century astronomical pastel, scientifically accurate celestial forms with soft luminous glows on textured paper.

styles.name: Dazzle Camouflage
styles.prompt: Draw using WWI dazzle patterns, disruptive black-white geometry that fractures silhouette and confuses direction.

styles.name: Toba-e Caricature (Edo)
styles.prompt: Draw playful anthropomorphic animals in flowing brush lines, sparse color, and witty Edo-period caricature energy.

styles.name: Anamorphic Hidden Image
styles.prompt: Draw an anamorphic illusion that resolves into a hidden portrait or symbol from a specific viewing angle.

styles.name: 'Bad Painting' Irreverent Figuration
styles.prompt: Draw intentionally naive figures with flat planes, decorative patterns, and cheeky anti-polish attitude.

styles.name: Etched Gothic-Surreal Linework
styles.prompt: Draw dense gothic-surreal line etchings, spired architectures and grotesques in obsessive cross-hatching.

styles.name: Doodle-Constructivist Architecture
styles.prompt: Draw fantastical doodle-architecture, biomorphic buildings fused with everyday objects in exuberant schematic chaos.

styles.name: Nychos Street Mural (Anatomical Cross-Section)
styles.prompt: Draw a bold street-art mural showing skeletal anatomy beneath the surface, x-ray layers and high-contrast spray.

styles.name: Neo-Surreal Polished Macabre
styles.prompt: Draw crisp neo-surreal scenes with uncanny body fragments, glossy finish, and quietly humorous dark undertones.

styles.name: Psychedelic Retro Poster ('60s)
styles.prompt: Draw a 1960s-style psychedelic poster, swirling saturated gradients, bold lettering forms, and subtle film-grain texture.

styles.name: Quantum Flux Patterns
styles.prompt: Draw in a quantum-inspired style, with probabilistic wave-like forms, shimmering particle trails, and dynamic interference patterns that shift with perspective.

styles.name: Bioplastic Morphic Layers
styles.prompt: Draw with translucent, organic bioplastic layers, fluid cellular structures, and soft bioluminescent gradients that mimic living tissue.

styles.name: Glitchtopian Relics
styles.prompt: Draw as fragmented digital artifacts, with pixelated decay, corrupted data shards, and neon glitches forming futuristic relics.

styles.name: Aerochromatic Flux
styles.prompt: Draw with iridescent, prismatic color shifts, fluid metallic sheens, and aerodynamic contours that evoke weightless energy flows.

styles.name: Neural Tapestry Weave
styles.prompt: Draw as a neural network-inspired tapestry, with interconnected nodal threads, synaptic pulses, and evolving fractal patterns in muted tones.

styles.name: The Bengal School of Art
styles.prompt: Draw in the Bengal School of Art style, with delicate Japanese wash watercolor layers, soft dreamlike atmospheres, sombre muted palettes, refined linear figures, and flattened miniature-inspired perspectives depicting mystical or symbolic scenes.

styles.name: Africobra
styles.prompt: Draw in Africobra style, with vibrant coolade colors, rhythmic interlocking patterns, bold text and imagery, and powerful depictions of Black identity, community, and pride infused with positive energy.

styles.name: Stridentism (Estridentismo)
styles.prompt: Draw in Stridentism style, with dynamic fragmented lines, urban-industrial motifs like skyscrapers, machines, airplanes, and telegraph cables, woodcut-like bold contrasts, and irreverent, energetic compositions celebrating modernity and revolution.

styles.name: Gutai Group
styles.prompt: Draw in Gutai Group style, emphasizing raw energy, explosive splatters, smeared textures, gouges, drips, and unconventional materials, capturing the physical force and bodily movement of performance-based creation.

styles.name: Ebru (Turkish Paper Marbling)
styles.prompt: Draw in Ebru marbling style, with floating pigments on liquid, combed into swirling veins, concentric organic forms, bleeding edges, and fluid unpredictable patterns resembling marble, smoke, or water.

styles.name: Pysanka Symbology
styles.prompt: Draw in Pysanka style, with geometric wax-resist motifs, suns, stars, trees of life, birds, and eternity bands, structured into symmetrical sections, using symbolic colors like red, black, yellow, and green for dense talismanic patterns.

styles.name: Lowbrow (Pop Surrealism)
styles.prompt: Draw in Lowbrow Pop Surrealism style, with polished classical painting techniques applied to playful or grotesque cartoon-like characters, surreal juxtapositions, kitsch pop-culture icons, and satirical, humorous undertones.

styles.name: Algorithmic Beauty (Fractal Art)
styles.prompt: Draw in fractal art style, with infinitely recursive geometric spirals, self-similar branching forms, organic mathematical patterns, and intricate details resembling galaxies, coastlines, snowflakes, or tree growth.

styles.name: Vaporwave Aesthetics
styles.prompt: Draw in Vaporwave style, with pastel pink and blue gradients, retro computer graphics, VHS glitch textures, Greco-Roman statues, obsolete 90s UI elements, palm trees, Japanese text, and a melancholic nostalgic mood.

styles.name: Risograph Texture
styles.prompt: Draw in Risograph style, with limited vibrant spot colors, overprinted layers creating unexpected blends, halftone grainy textures, and charming imperfections like misaligned color registration and uneven ink coverage.
